categories: Category:Grand Moffs of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Bartam was a Human Grand Moff of the Galactic Empire. Like his fellow Grand Moff Trachta, Bartam was a cyborg.

He conspired with Grand Moff Trachta and Moff Kadir to kill Emperor Palpatine and Darth Vader, but tensions amongst the conspirators led to infighting, and Bartam had Gauer, another of the conspirators, shoot Trachta.
However, just after Trachta's murder, another conspirator, General Skosef, killed Bartam only to be killed himself by Bartam's stormtrooper guard.
